\pop[-1]Hello There! I'm Gary, and I'm currently studying Pokémon in
Heydey Island. You must be in the S.S.Anne in your way to the island, right?

first Pokémon, lucky for you, there is a person on the ship who can help us.
\pop[-1]I'm talking about Professor Oak! He will give you any information
you need. Searh him and get ready to begin your Pokémon adventure!
\pop[-1]I must leave. Good luck and see you later!
